vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to and an expansion of Specific Use Permit No. 1450 for an open-enrollment charter school and a proposed child-care facility on property zoned an R-7.5(A) Single Family District at the southwest corner of West Illinois Avenue and Chalmers Street
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval for a three-year period, subject to a revised site/landscape plan, a revised traffic management plan, and conditions
Z201-238(RM)
